itunes:summary:
Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe was assassinated using a homemade gun, we break down the video of the attack and how badly Abe's security screwed up protecting him -- plus Vince McMahon paid millions to silence women he sexually harassed, and Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh was harassed while out to dinner.
